message:
2018-12-31

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2018/12/04/cnn10/ten-content-weds/index.html

Transcript: http://transcripts.cnn.com/TRANSCRIPTS/1812/05/sn.01.html

오늘은, 에너지의 공유를 이용한 블록체인 기술의 적용에 관한 내용이 인상 깊습니다. 최근 에어비엔비, 우버 등 공유경제를 활용하는 사례가 많은데요, 에너지 분야에서는 블록체인 기술과 함께 어떠한 첨단 기술이 적용되어지고 있는지 확인하실 수 있습니다.

Today, I am impressed with the application of blockchain technology using energy sharing. There are a lot of recent uses in shared economies such as Air Bienby and Uber. For today's episode, you can see which cutting-edge technologies are being applied along with blockchain technology especially in the energy sector,.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 01:50
Protests for increasing the disel prices in France.

01:50 - 03:10
Funeral of former U.S. president George H. W. Bush.

03:10 - 06:30
The possible role of blockchain technology in how people get electricity.

06:30 - 08:40
How 26 monkeys previously used for research will now spend retirement at a sanctuary in Florida.
